entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 6 ABOVE
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 80 PERCENT

SNOW
MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 19
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
